issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
The Quartz scheduler as part of the OSG is started statically at class load and no shutdown hooks cleanly shut it down.

As a result, I have been seeing failures of the system to shutdown properly when a quartz task is running during system shutdown and DB operations fail. This causes the system shutdown to hang and never complete.

Quartz should be shutdown either via shutdown hooks in eucalyptus (the euca-internal shutdown hooks) or as part of the stop() of the OSG service itself. Since it is part of the OSG it should be tied to that lifecycle.

Log:
{code}
2014-02-28 11:34:44  INFO 000000015 OrderedShutdown          | Executing Post-Shutdown Hook: com.eucalyptus.system.Threads$ThreadPool$1@38803dfd
2014-02-28 11:34:44  WARN 000000015 Threads                  | SHUTDOWN:Eucalyptus.bootstrap:Hosts:oob-pool Stopping thread pool...
2014-02-28 11:34:44  INFO 000000015 OrderedShutdown          | Executing Post-Shutdown Hook: PostgresqlBootstrapper$3@6b65ca05
2014-02-28 11:34:44  INFO 000000015 setup_db                 | Postgres command : '/usr/pgsql-9.1//bin/pg_ctl' 'stop' '-mf' '-D/opt/eucalyptus/var/lib/eucalyptus/db/data'
2014-02-28 11:34:45  INFO 000000015 setup_db                 | stdout: waiting for server to shut down.... done
2014-02-28 11:34:45  INFO 000000015 setup_db                 | stdout: server stopped
2014-02-28 11:34:48 DEBUG 000001178 ropertySettingJobFactory | Producing instance of Job 'OsgJobs.job2', class=com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.jobs.MainObjectReaperJob
2014-02-28 11:34:48 DEBUG 000001178 QuartzSchedulerThread    | batch acquisition of 1 triggers
2014-02-28 11:34:48 DEBUG 000001173 JobRunShell              | Calling execute on job OsgJobs.job2
2014-02-28 11:34:48 DEBUG 000001173 ObjectReaperTask         | Initiating object-storage object reaper task
2014-02-28 11:34:48  WARN 000001173 Entities                 | javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not open connection
2014-02-28 11:34:48  WARN 000001173 ObjectReaperTask         | Error encountered during reaping of deleting-state object. Will retry on next cycle
java.lang.NullPointerException
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.metadata.DbObjectMetadataManagerImpl.lookupObjectsInState(DbObjectMetadataManagerImpl.java:124)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.asynctask.ObjectReaperTask.cleanDeleting(ObjectReaperTask.java:81)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.asynctask.ObjectReaperTask.run(ObjectReaperTask.java:64)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.jobs.MainObjectReaperJob.execute(MainObjectReaperJob.java:79)
        at org.quartz.core.JobRunShell.run(JobRunShell.java:213)
        at org.quartz.simpl.SimpleThreadPool$WorkerThread.run(SimpleThreadPool.java:557)
2014-02-28 11:34:48  WARN 000001173 Entities                 | javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not open connection
2014-02-28 11:34:48  WARN 000001173 bjectMetadataManagerImpl | Error fetching failed or deleted object records
2014-02-28 11:34:48  WARN 000001173 ObjectReaperTask         | Error encountered during reaping of deleting-state object. Will retry on next cycle
com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.exceptions.MetadataOperationFailureException: javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not open connection
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.metadata.DbObjectMetadataManagerImpl.lookupFailedObjects(DbObjectMetadataManagerImpl.java:246)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.asynctask.ObjectReaperTask.cleanFailed(ObjectReaperTask.java:98)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.asynctask.ObjectReaperTask.run(ObjectReaperTask.java:65)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.jobs.MainObjectReaperJob.execute(MainObjectReaperJob.java:79)
        at org.quartz.core.JobRunShell.run(JobRunShell.java:213)
        at org.quartz.simpl.SimpleThreadPool$WorkerThread.run(SimpleThreadPool.java:557)
Caused by: javax.persistence.PersistenceException: org.hibernate.exception.GenericJDBCException: Could not open connection
        at org.hibernate.ejb.AbstractEntityManagerImpl.convert(AbstractEntityManagerImpl.java:1387)
        at org.hibernate.ejb.AbstractEntityManagerImpl.convert(AbstractEntityManagerImpl.java:1310)
        at org.hibernate.ejb.AbstractEntityManagerImpl.throwPersistenceException(AbstractEntityManagerImpl.java:1397)
        at org.hibernate.ejb.TransactionImpl.begin(TransactionImpl.java:62)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx$TxState.begin(Entities.java:1128)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities$CascadingTx.begin(Entities.java:990)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.createTransaction(Entities.java:205)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.get(Entities.java:225)
        at com.eucalyptus.entities.Entities.transactionFor(Entities.java:242)
        at com.eucalyptus.objectstorage.metadata.DbObjectMetadataManagerImpl.lookupFailedObjects(DbObjectMetadataManagerImpl.java:234)
        ... 5 more
:
{code}
fields.summary: Quartz scheduler not terminating properly on system shutdown

comments.body:
Test in both HA and non-HA environment, not seeing anymore.

Installed Packages:
{noformat}
Name        : eucalyptus
Arch        : x86_64
Version     : 4.0.0
Release     : 0.0.880.20140415git1b9f1d5b.el6
Size        : 283 k
Repo        : installed
{noformat}
